name: Hot Italian Sausage Soup
ingredients: 1 14 1/2 oz. can Italian stewed tomatoes (I used 2 cans)
3/4 cups julienned red, green and/or yellow pepper
1/4 cups white wine or chicken broth
instructions: In large skillet, cook sausage over medium heat until no longer pink.
In another pan combine remaining ingredients.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer 10 minutes until veggies are tender.
Drain sausage; add to soup and heat through.
